welcome_title: Personalised photo magnets and stylish cards for any occasion.
create_our_services: Create something unique with personalized magnets and stylish high quality cards!
we_offer: From idea to reality - design, web and custom services for every occasion!
logo_card: Do you need a professional design, website or custom services? We are here for you!

mission_text: We believe that small gestures bring great joy and that's why we create handmade magnets and cards. Each piece is made with attention to details and imbued with lots of love. Our mission is to help you express your emotions in an original and memorable way.
team_text: Our team is made up of talented designers with extensive experience. We pay great attention to details and strive to exceed your expectations.  We believe that with creativity and precision we can create something truly special together.  Contact us to discuss your ideas!
contact_us_text: Do not hesitate to contact us via the contact form
our_services_text: Our team specializes in creating a complete vision for your business. We design distinctive logos that not only attract attention but also reflect the essence of your brand. We also develop functional and modern websites that help your business shine in the online space.
logo_design_text: Creating a unique and professional logo is essential for building a strong identity for your company. Our talented designers will create a logo that will set your business apart and attract potential customers.
website_text: We develop websites with modern and responsive designs that are tailored to the needs of your business. A well-designed website is key to establishing your online presence and growing your customer base. This website, for example, was entirely developed by us using Angular, a modern framework for web development, and TypeScript, a powerful programming language that ensures reliability and scalability.
sales_title: Social Events, Custom Solutions, and Bulk Sales
sales_text1: In addition to our standard products and services, we also cater to social events such as weddings, christenings, and other celebrations. We create personalized magnets, cards, and other souvenirs to make your special event even more memorable. Every detail is crafted with love and care to provide a unique experience for you and your guests.
sales_text2: Additionally, we offer bulk sales and custom orders for businesses. Whether you need wholesale quantities of our standard products or personalized items tailored to your needs, we are here to help. Contact us for a free consultation and quote.
why_us_text1: Experience and creativity are key factors in achieving impressive results. We keep up with the latest trends in branding and web design to help your business grow in an ever-changing environment.
why_us_text2: Trust us to take your online presence to the next level. Contact us today for a free consultation and offer
name: Name
how_to_order_q: How can I place an order?
how_to_order_a: You can place an order by following these steps:
how_to_order_1: 1. Select the desired product and add it to your cart.
how_to_order_2: 2. Go to the "Cart" section and upload the required photos for the selected product, if applicable.
how_to_order_3: 3. When uploading photos, a window for resizing the image will appear. Adjust the size as needed.
how_to_order_4: 4. After uploading and resizing the photos, complete your order by following the confirmation and payment steps.
order_time_a: The delivery time depends on the number of orders. Typically, delivery takes 1 to 3 business days.
kind_of_photos_q: What kind of photos can I use?
kind_of_photos_a: You can use photos that are your original work or images for which you hold the rights.
photo_resolution_q: What quality should the photos be?
photo_resolution_a: The quality of the photos is entirely up to you. The higher the resolution, the better the final product will be. We recommend well-lit and high-resolution photos to achieve the best possible result when crafting the magnet. Avoid blurry or pixelated images.
delivery_offer_a: Yes, we offer delivery to your address or to a courier office nationwide. The delivery cost is determined according to the courier company's rates.
chose_number_q: Can I choose the number of offered products?
chose_number_a: If you would like to order a different quantity than the one listed on the page, please contact us via the contact form
what_other_services_q: What other services do you offer?
what_other_services_a: You can check out the full list of services we provide
logo_website_q: What is the timeframe for creating a logo or website?
logo_website_a: The timeframe for creating logos and websites ranges from 1 to 4 weeks, depending on the complexity and specifics of the project.
logo_what_q: What does the logo creation service include?
logo_what_1: 1. A consultation to define the concept and vision for your logo.
logo_what_2: 2. Development of several logo variations for you to choose from.
logo_what_3: 3. Up to three revisions to align with your preferences and requirements.
logo_what_4: 4. Delivery of the final logo in all necessary file formats (for print and web).
website_what_q: What website creation services do you offer?
website_what_1: • Development of corporate, personal, and e-commerce websites.
website_what_2: • Complete planning and design tailored to your needs.
website_what_3: • Responsive design, ensuring your website looks great on both desktop and mobile devices.
final_design_q: Can I see a preliminary design before finalizing my order?
final_design_a: Yes, we will send you a preliminary design for approval. You will have the opportunity to suggest changes or adjustments to ensure the final version meets your expectations.
title: Privacy Policy
intro2: are committed to protecting our customers' personal data and complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Personal Data Protection Act of the Republic of Bulgaria. This privacy policy outlines the data we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding it.
data_controller_content3: For questions regarding the processing of personal data, you can contact us
data_collected_content: We collect the following categories of personal data:
data_collected_list6: Details of the services used and order history
data_processing_content: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
data_processing_list2: Sending information about products, promotions, and news (only with your consent)
data_processing_list3: Improving our services and analyzing customer preferences
data_processing_list4: Complying with legal obligations for storing accounting and financial documents
legal_basis_content: The processing of personal data is based on:
legal_basis_list1: Your consent (e.g., for receiving marketing communications)
legal_basis_list2: Contract performance (e.g., when you place an order)
legal_basis_list3: Our legitimate interest (e.g., for improving our services)
legal_basis_list4: Compliance with legal requirements (e.g., for tax reporting)
data_retention_content: Your personal data will be retained for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined above unless the law requires a longer retention period.
data_sharing_content: We may share your personal data with the following categories of recipients:
data_sharing_list1: Courier service providers for order delivery
data_sharing_list3: External consultants and partners who help us improve our services
data_sharing_list4: Government authorities when required by law
your_rights_content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
your_rights_list1: The right to access your data
your_rights_list2: The right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
your_rights_list3: The right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
your_rights_list4: The right to object to the processing of personal data
your_rights_list6: The right to withdraw your consent at any time (where processing is based on consent)
security_measures_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.
complaints_content: If you believe your rights have been violated, you can file a complaint with the Bulgarian Commission for Personal Data Protection at: 2 Prof. Tsvetan Lazarov Blvd., Sofia 1592, or visit their website:
cookies_content1: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit the site. They help us recognize your browser, analyze site traffic, and improve functionality.
cookies_content2: The main purposes of using cookies include:
cookies_content3: You can manage cookies by adjusting your browser settings. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect site functionality.
cookies_content4: For more information about cookies and how to manage them, visit

express_shipping_p: Orders placed by 3:00 PM are handled the same day.

magnet_info_title2: Your memories - always in plain sight
magnet_info_p2: With a magnet that makes them even more special

thanks_for_choosing_us: Thank you for choosing our store! Your order has been successfully registered in the system.
order_p_call: Expect a call from our team soon to confirm order details. After successful confirmation, Your order will be processed and shipped to the address you provide or courier office.
order_p: If you have further questions or wish to make changes to your order, you can contact us.
